main: ^I am Soren, I've come to cleanse the corruption from this temple and free its guardians. Please, let me help you.
^I do not need your help. I have pledged my allegiance to the demon, and I will stop at nothing to see its will carried out.
^The demon has twisted your mind.  Let me help you break free from its grasp
^I am not under anyone's control but my own.  I have chosen this path, a path of power.
^I cannot let you continue down this path of corruption. If you won't listen to reason, then I will have to defeat you.
